biotools.summary: Web interface for managing assembly projects of bacterial genomes. It was created to assist bioinformaticians to assemble bacterial genomes sequenced with NextGeneration Sequencing (NGS) platforms quickly, easily and effectively.

bioschemas.name: SIMBA
